summary:
My career consists of numerous consultant jobs(ATOS ORIGIN, Pink Roccade and Yacht) for the top 50 companies in the Netherlands and several permanent jobs at top 50 companies in the Netherlands(Essent, Achmea).  I have a permanent visum and a cartão de trabalho. I'm married with a carioca.

I worked from 1997 until 2006 as a consultant in different roles. 
from 1997 until 2005 as a developer, from 1999 until 2006 as a database administrator.
From 2006 until 2011 i had a permanent job at RWE as a projectmanager IT.
From 2011 i switched to the business site of RWE as a projectmanager because of my IT background, I’m very suitable for the translation of functional requirements to IT.

I have done projects as a project manager at Essent, RWE, KPN and Achmea. 
I did infrastructure projects, data migration and data moving projects, software development projects, hosting projects, database integration projects, european software tender project, business projects
A number of projects were international by nature. The numbers of fte per project varied from 5 to 30 fte with budgets of up to 2.5 million euro. 

As a project manager I worked with international and multidisciplinary teams. I'm Prince II, agile scrum master, ITIL certified. I am also Lean sixsigma Greenbelt certified. 

As a (business) project manager I was responsible for translating business requirements and selecting suppliers through RFI and RFP procedures by using multicultural and multidisciplinary teams. The implementation of the projects was done with the Prince 2 methodology, I also did a number of projects with Agile and scrum.

I’m a reliable, creative and stress-resistant force, who is flexible in many projects and project-based processes. I can be used both in business issues translations to analyze and implementing technology and technical issues. I’ve got no 9 to 5 mentality and i learned a lot in my evening hours. Traveling has always been part of the job.

profile_positions.description:
Introducing the digital freight document in the logistics supply chain.
Coach European customers in using and implementing TransFollow.
Giving demo's and attending fairs as the first technical contact person for  potential and new customers.
Mentor and educate sales partners for France, Spain, Belgium and the Netherlands.
Projectmanagement of implementations when there are multiple parties involved.

METHODEN & TECHNIEKEN	:	ITIL, six-sigma, agile, scrum, lean
HULPMIDDELEN	:	MS-Office,  rest API, Postman, json.
profile_positions.title: International Implementation Manager

company.name: tried to start a life in Brazil

profile_positions.company: tried to start a life in Brazil
profile_positions.description: Tried to start a life in Rio de Janeiro because my wife is Brazilian. Because of the crisis there it was very hard to find a well paid job. So i just did some volunteer work for the Dutch community in Rio (digitalising their newsletters) and some work for the chamber of commerce in Rio and Sao Paulo.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
APPLICATION	:	Project management, energy innovation
BACKGROUND	:	Senior Officer in the sales portfolio department for the Netherlands and Belgium and innovation projects like solar panels, windmills, smart metering and self-sustaining villages. 
TASK	:	Responsible for the functioning of the datamanagement ICT environment of the sales portfolio department and project creation and management of business issues. Innovation projectmanagement for the unit New Energie. Smart metering.
METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II, lean six-sigma, agile, scrum, portfolio management
AID	:	MS-Office, MS-Project and mindmap, six-sigma, agile and scrum tools

Infrastructure projects, datamigration projects, software implementation projects, business projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Officer

profile_positions.description:
BACKGROUND	:	Business function of Power/Gas Pricing Analyst.  
SITUATION	:	Power/Gas pricing for the Netherlands and Belgium. 
TASK	:	Daily pricing of the Gas and Power prices for the Netherlands and Belgium. Analyse loads of big customers and special deals. Analyse pricing and reports.
AID	:	MS-Office, advanced excel, , access, vb script, MS sql server, Salesforce
profile_positions.title: Pricing Analyst

profile_positions.description:
LINE	:	Energy market (NL, BE, GB, DLD)
BACKGROUND	:	RWE Energy Netherlands N.V. was part of the international German company RWE AG, with it’s headquarter in Essen, Germany. Since October 2009, RWE Germany is the owner of Essent NL. RWE NL was integrated with Essent NL in 2010.

Project 1 (RWE): selecting and implementing a billing system for large business consumption electricity. 
Project 2 (RWE): setting up the Forecasting system by means of a selection process (RFI/RFP) and implementation project for gas.  
Project 3 (RWE): selecting and implementing a fiscal shipper registry for gas and implementation control signal gas. 
Project 4 (RWE): design and implementation of the reconciliation process between the different market parties for gas. 
Project 5 (Essent): integration with Essent for Forecasting and reconciliation.
Project 6 (Essent): Data migrations to Essent systems for Data management en forecasts.  
Project 7 (Essent): deploy a utility gas prices. 
Project 8 (Essent): control signal new market model implementation. Project 9 (Essent) build an SAP interface for SPM project financing. Project 10 (Essent): timely and accurate invoicing RUN gas wholesale final bill (B2B). 
Project 11 (Essent): Upgrade system for carrier forecast.
RFI and RFP with outside vendors from all over the world. Project planning, claiming resources, tuning and supplement business requirements. Tuning with the customer planning, resources, alignment with the vendor.  tuning of service level agreements, package negotiation and budget monitoring, managing external parties.  In addition, progress monitoring, escalation processes, project prioritization.

Infrastructure projects, datamigration projects, software development projects, software implementation projects.

METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II,  Lean sixsigma, agile/scrum, portfolio management

tools: MS-Office, MS-Project, MS-Visio, ORACLE, MS Sql server, MECOMS, MS Dynamics, Unix, Windows server, Access, outsystems, EDM
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
LINE	:	Social Service
TASKS	:	Functional administration
APPLICATION	:	Population administration
BACKGROUND	:	The DUO-Group is an independent governant body in assignment of the Minister of education, culture and Science (OCW) acting on a number of educational laws and regulations. The core tasks of the DUO-Group is finance, information management and organizing exams. The customers are the individual education followers and educational organizations in Netherlands.
SITUATION	:	Functional management function with regards to user acceptance testing and supervising testers.
TASK	:	As a senior functional manager used in the user acceptance testing and make improvements on existing applications. Also performance monitoring of the application.
Tasks:
-setting up user acceptance testing
-guiding users in the test environment
-functional testing of the application Report and consultation with construction and designers about application errors
-documenting testing
-reviewing and making improvements on the existing application
-Performance measurements on the existing application 
-monitors application on specifications
METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II
AID	:	IBM AS/400, PC, Windows NT, MS-Office (Word, Excel, Access)
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
LINE	:	Government Belgium
TASKS	:	Information management en technical design
APPLICATION	:	Auditing
BACKGROUND	:	Region Antwerp/Liège  wants the mainframe environment changed with another system, preferably ORACLE.
SITUATION	:	Region Antwerp/Liège wants the mainframe environment changed with another system and wrote an European tender for potential suppliers asking for possible solutions. Their preference is a platform where ORACLE runs on.
TASK	:	Elaboration of different scenarios to the mainframe and IDMS platform. There are several scenarios written for a Windows and Unix platform with the ORACLE and MS SQL server database environment. For the information analysis I spent some time in the region specifying the framework conditions of the current infra. Then I worked out the scenarios and project planning (global) and equipped them with resources and budgeting.
METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II
AID	:	MS-Office, MS-Project, MS-Visio
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
CLIENT	:	KPN managed & integrated solutions, in Heerlen (NL)
LINE	:	Telecom suppliers
TASKS	:	Projectmanagement
BACKGROUND	:	All business development enquiries for KPN with regards to hosting and housing of customers accommodated in their cyber centers.
SITUATION	:	Within the KPN organization the BSO determines if these requests can be performed by KPN. This results in projects requests which are made, developed and implemented by me en my fellow project managers.
TASK	:	Making the project planning, claim resources and Tuning with the customer and external suppliers, adjusting according to the agreed service level agreement. In addition, progress monitoring, escalation processes, project prioritization. I did the following projects (some concurrently):
-expansion server park telephone directories (hosting and housing) for www.telefoongids.nl. 
-expansion server park and cluster introduction ms-sql server at BDO. 
-New customer D (utch) W (ater) D (reams). Ordering, organizing and delivering a scalable server park to a multimedia solution.
- Unbundling of the NRE/E-ON SAP landscape to their own SAP landscape in collaboration with a group of external programmers (Accenture). Ordering, provisioning (SAP) and delivery of the server fleet.
- For Wegener multimedia in cooperation with ORACLE Netherlands expanding, and advise on, the existing server park and data bandwidth i.v.m. www.autotrack.nl and www.autotelegraaf.nl the site.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

TASKS	:	Auditing/ team leading/DBA

-setting up and conducting Analysis on the basis of functional questions by users and project-drafting user requirements of the Department operation on entering ITSD (incident registration system)
-supporting the division operation with pl/sql query and oracle issues
-Make the FO and TO for analysis and querys pl/sql for the division operation
-activating improve proposals on application software
-Performance measurements on the existing application monitors query pl/sql and batches

METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II
AID	:	HP ux, open VMS, PC, Windows NT, Windows XP, MS-Office (Word, Excel, Access), reflection, PL/SQL, SQL, oracle 8i en 9i, TOAD, VBScript.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
CLIENT	:	Achmea Active, in Apeldoorn (NL)
LINE	:	Insurance, Pensions and Banking
TASKS	:	Auditing, Database design, Datamanagement, Projectmanagement
APPLICATION	:	Maintenance Information systems, Development in projects
BACKGROUND	:	Achmea offers:
-insurance
-banking and mortgage products
-pension administrations
-assistance at home and abroad-Prevention and reintegration services
-Services that promote a healthy lifestyle
SITUATION	:	The objective of the DBA Department within Achmea is that every DBA is multidisciplinary with one or more specialties. The databases were managed by the following vendors:
- ORACLE
- IBM
- Microsoft
- CA
TASK	:	My main tasks were DBA IDMS and ORACLE DBA, in addition existed about 25% of my work as a MS SQL server DBA. The platforms were IDMS/mainframe, ORACLE/Unix/Windows NT/Windows 2000/Windows 2003, MS SQL server/Windows NT/Windows 2000/Windows 2003.  Also sharpening and meet service level agreements with customers of DBA services. The last year I did a MS SQL server consolidation project as a projectmanager within Achmea .I designed the whole MS SQL server management environment, developed and made it operational for all Achmea labels.
METHODS & TECHNICS	:	ITIL, PRINCE II
AID	:	IBM Mainframe, PC, IDMS 12.1/14.0/15.0, ORACLE 7.3.4/8.0.5/8.1.5./9.2.0, MS SQL server 6.5/7.0/2000/2005, os/390, Windows NT, Windows 2000, Windows 2003, Windows XP, SUN SOLARIS Unix, HP Unix, Enterprise manager, rman, Tivoli, Toad, MS-Office (Word, Excel, Access), Lotus Notes, PC Anywhere, Dameware, VB6, Unix scripting, COBOL, MS-Project, MS-Visio

volunteer_experiences.description: I moved in September 2016 to Brasil and joined the Dutch Community in October. I'm responsible for coordinating the activities organised by the Community.
